Description:
Brilliant Debut Or Investment Option In Prime Locale
A location offering the ultimate lifestyle convenience moments to Clayton station, Monash University, Clayton shopping precinct and Monash Medical Centre complements the entry level appeal or investment attractiveness of this exceptional dual-level townhouse. With its own street presence, this outstanding home exemplifies private & stress-free living, with a spacious lounge flowing through to a modern kitchen/meals (Bosch dishwasher) with gas cooking & low-maintenance courtyard with synthetic turf. 3 bedrooms, including main with access to a 2-way bathroom and 2nd toilet, is complemented by GDH, split system AC, satellite dish, alarm system, intercom & auto SLUG with own driveway maximising owner-occupier comfort or improving rental returns if desired.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
** Auction This Saturday at 2.30pm ** Redevelop A Corner Position Close To Station
Impressive options with endless advantages, this sizeable corner allotment of 645m2 (approx) invites a huge array of opportunity. Build a magnificent dream home or a multi dwelling development consisting of 3 townhouses (STCA) - whichever option is adopted it is sure to deliver a richly rewarding outcome. A high growth suburb conveniently located within easy reach of schools, local shops, Westall train station, Monash University and all major arterials. The combination of large land size and premium location will be a huge draw card for home owners, investors and developers alike.

Description:
LUXURIOUS AND SPACIOUS
This lavish home was cleverly designed to meet modern demands. Comprising of 4 bedrooms with built in robes, master bedroom with ensuite, , tiled entry, vogue quality third bathroom with separate bath, huge spacious lounge with air conditioning, modern spacious kitchen , large lounge and single garage plus one car space outside garage. Ideally designed rear yard for entertaining guests and neat storage shed, Features: Ducted heating, split system air conditioner, alarm system,quality carpets, window furnishing and sun filled middle courtyard. Located near Clayton Shopping Centre, Community Centre/Pool, Clayton Train Station and close to Westall station for access to the Cranbourne and Pakenham line and interstate travels,. This near new property will please even the most sophisticated buyer. Perfect for larger families or investors. Currently leased monthly. Terms 10% deposit Bal 30/60 days.ID REQUIRED FOR ENTRY
CALL NOW TO INSPECT WWW.DARRASZERVAS.COM.AU

Description:
AUCTION THIS SAT AT 11 AM
GREAT INVESTMENT OR HOME
An unbeatable location only minutes walk to station, shops & bus at doorstep. This 2 bedroom unit features a comfortable lounge, separate kitchen/meals area with gas cooking. Both bedrooms have DBIR's. Separate bathroom, toilet & laundry. Freshly painted & new carpets over hardwood floors. Ample off-street parking & lock up garage. Private large rear yard with an added bonus of a toilet & wash basin at the rear of the garage for the keen gardener. Perfect place to start your future investment or ideal for the retiree or 1st home buyer.

Description:
CLAYTON AREA'S MOST AFFORDABLE
A CLASSIC CLINKER BRICK HOME ON A SUBDIVIDED CORNER BLOCK in the burgeoning Clayton South area, this home is perfect for investors with a lease giving you the security of an instant return. In very good condition the classic contemporary clinker brick home is largely original and offers great potential for future renovation that will add both style and significant value. Inside you find generous living space between the vast lounge/dining room with gas heater, separate family room and the central kitchen with corner pantry, upright oven/stove and adjoining meals area. There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes including the master that has an ensuite to complement the family bathroom. Outside you find a single carport and an easily maintained yard with handy storage shed. A great location completes the picture - with buses, Clayton South Primary School, Clarinda Shopping Centre and central Clayton all nearby.
Insights: 36 Glencannon Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Owner Says Sell! Under Contract.
Prior Offers Invited!
With its own street frontage and own carport on title, this single level beauty offers great living for the budget conscious.
This excellent property features a large living room, opening to a spacious kitchen with family meals area and conveniently overlooking a lovely, fully landscaped backyard. 2 good sized bedrooms both with built in robes, extra large bathroom with separate toilet, gas cooking and heating and a carport. All this within close proximity to Clayton shops, train station, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and local schools. Inspection a must! Call Rene on 0413 330 357.

Must Be Sold!! Will Be Sold!! Under Contract.
(All Offers in By Sept 21st @7pm)
A great place to start or a perfect place for empty nesters. Offering home accommodation with the convenience of a compact block (400m2 approx.)
All the hard work is done for you, thoughtfully renovated offering the classic feel of yesteryears whilst perfectly blending the right amount of modern conveniences.....
You will love the light filled rooms, the extra wide custom windows capturing the morning sun or enjoy the warmth of the ducted heating/ wood fire on those cold wintry days.
Conveniently located between Westall Station and Clayton Station, offering easy and quick access to all of your favourite places. With Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Ikea, Costco (Moorabbin), Chadstone and Springvale shopping Centre nearby.....what more could you want???
Features
Fully renovated inside and out
3 Large Bedrooms
Beautiful Modern Kitchen
Open Plan Living

Super Solid Home in a growth location

An inspection will impress................

Description:
Upfront Easy Living
Built in 2009, this modern townhouse boasts sleek spaces and a stellar location. Immediately captivating, the home greets with a light-filled open plan living domain where the kitchen, lounge and dining areas seamlessly combine for complete practicality. There's also three bedrooms, two bathrooms plus a powder room, and a private paved courtyard which provides a low maintenance outdoor entertaining space. Highly convenient, you'll find Westall Station, Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary and local shops are mere metres away, while a short drive will take you right into the heart of Springvale's vibrant shopping and dining district.
Also features:
*Quality kitchen with stone benches & SS appls
*Main bed with ensuite & WIR; BIRs to beds 2 & 3
*Remote double garage; Ducted heating & cooling
*Easy access to the Monash Freeway & Monash Uni
*Within close proximity of Monash Medical Centre
*Close to Spring Valley Golf Club & parks/reserves
Insights: 113 Rosebank Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Nice and quiet family home!
With its charm and welcoming entrance, this freshly painted home invites you and your family to move in and enjoy. Designed for family harmony with a generous Master bedroom with FES and WIR to the front and kids zoned in the rear with a family bathroom and separate WC. Ready to entertain with spacious family room, living/dining areas and open plan kitchen with S/S appliances.
Benefits include timber floors, gas appliances, ducted heating, split AC, double LU garage and low maintenance gardens.
Just minutes' walk to buses, reserves and a short distance to Westall Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Springvale Shopping Centres and IKEA Home Maker Village. Easy excess to Princess Highway & Monash University.
Land size of 610m2 approx.
Terms: 10% deposit
Balance: 30/45 days
Photo ID required for all inspections

Description:
The Perfect Place To Start
Looking for the right opportunity in the market? Whether a first-home buyer or canny investor, this three-bedroom home is packed with potential to create something brilliant.
The interiors are clean and bright with original fittings, and would benefit from a modernising touch to bring them back to life. The large open-plan kitchen/dining means plenty or space for the young family, while the wonderful timber floors add a warming, classic atmosphere.
At the rear is where you'll find a huge paved courtyard, ideal for summer entertaining and again, just waiting for a creative touch to add a little spark.
To add to its value, the single-level residence with its own driveway is also within walking distance of the Clayton shopping strip and Clayton train station and only a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Homemaker Centre and Chadstone Shopping Centre.
So whether you're looking to make the most of its rentability or start working on your family's future, this property has everything going for it.

Description:
Large Family Home. Walk to Everything!
This immaculate brick home could not be more perfectly located! A quiet court with no passing traffic, children's park at the bottom of the street, bus stop within 100 metres, prestigious St Andrews Primary school, shopping Centre and Community Centre within walking distance.
Property comprises formal entrance opening to living room, 4 bedrooms with built in robes, family size kitchen with large meals/dining area overlooking outside covered entertaining patio, family room, double lock up garage and spacious backyard.
The home is fully equipped with all the modern luxuries including ducted heating, air-conditioning and vacuum. Plus an extra large driveway to park as many cars as you want and even a boat.
All this on a very good size block of approx. 575sqm and only minutes away to Clayton shops, train station, medical centre and university.
Properties like this will not last long - be quick to inspect!
For more information call Rene Wrzos 0413 330 357.

Occupying a substantial, level allotment, this comfortable home is boosted by a preferred north-facing rear and desirable rectangular dimensions. Today's current spaces present a lounge, pristine kitchen/meals, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, laundry/study, ducted heating and double carport, ensuring live-in or lease-out options whilst future plans are considered. Sited on 710m2 (approx), offering attractive proximity to Keeley Reserve, bus routes, train station, schools, Clayton shops and Monash Medical Centre.

Description:
A MODERN & SPACIOUS REAR UNIT NEAR CENTRAL CLAYTON
As the rear of just 2, this unit offers privacy, convenience and is moments from central Clayton and its shops, cafes and train station makes it an impressive choice for home buyers and investors alike. Modern and spacious, it features a generous open living and dining area with polished hardwood floors as well as a kitchen with a stainless steel oven and cook top. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite to complement the family bathroom with included second toilet. Ducted heating is also included and outside you find a single garage and a lovely courtyard dominated by the covered deck that is perfect for entertaining.
Currently leased and returning over $21,300 per annum approximately.

Description:
A PRIVATE & LOW MAINTENANCE REAR TOWNHOUSE
In a quiet court position right near Clayton South Primary School and Clarinda Shopping Centre, this rear townhouse set behind just one other home promises a low maintenance lifestyle that will appeal to first home buyers and investors alike. Young, fresh impressively maintained it features a generous living and dining area with floating floors, a study nook and stylish kitchen with a feature tiled splash back and stainless appliances. There are 2 bedrooms upstairs with built in wardrobes and a central bathroom plus the bonus of toilets on each level. Extras include a split system heater/air conditioner, a single remote garage with internal access and a north facing courtyard with paved patio that is easy to maintain. You can also access central Claytons' shops, cafes and train stations with the soon to be completed Dingley Freeway also nearby.

Excellent opportunity to start-out or invest
With contemporary style and low maintenance ease, this streetfront dual-level townhouse offers a brilliant opportunity for those just starting out or looking for enticing investment rewards.
Impeccably presented, a smart open plan layout incorporates a spacious living/dining zone and modern kitchen with quality appliances, that effortlessly connects to a private entertaining courtyard. Optimum space is heightened by 3 robed bedrooms (2 featuring fully-tiled ensuites) plus a central bathroom placed for convenience on the ground floor. Split system heating/AC, open study and single carport complete an ideal opportunity to enjoy an easy-care lifestyle or appreciate consistent investment performance, just moments to Westall station, Westall Primary and Secondary and a short bus ride to Monash University.
Frank Scalise : 0488 144 833

Description:
Central location, affordable family convenience
Conveniently located close to all your important amenities, this immaculately presented three bedroom abode, boast generous size master bedroom with reverse air- conditioner, centralised bathroom, and separate toilet, large lounge with separate open plan kitchen/dining area, single lock up garage, low maintenance front and private rear yard, ample garden space for the kids to play in.
Located minutes from the Westall train station, primary and secondary schools, shops, parks and gardens. Only a short drive to Clayton train station, Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and IKEA shopping centre, Clarinda Central Shopping District and Springvale Central Shopping District.
To truly appreciate this property, an inspection is a must.
- Three generous size bedrooms all with built in robes
- Master with reverse cycle air-conditioner
- Large lounge room with separate open plan kitchen / dining area
- Bathroom with separate toilet
- Single lock up garage
- Gas heating in lounge room
- Private garden area.
- Tenanted at $375 per week

AFFORDABLE DEVELOPMENT SITE!
ATTENTION ALL DEVELOPERS AND INVESTORS, This property on approximately 1226 m2 of land is ideal for multiple townhouse development (Subject to Council Approval).
The real estate market in Clayton South is going from strength to strength and with the central Clayton market becoming almost out of reach, we see this opportunity as one to seriously consider.
The home has seen better days so it's all about the land here.
Well positioned, and in close proximity to Monash Freeway, Dingley Bypass, Springvale Shopping Centre and home maker centre (IKEA), Westall Train Station and Dingley shops also.
Feel free to contact us for more information.
AUCTION - UNLESS SOLD PRIOR!
